video_prompt: **Prompt:** A young woman, framed from above, slowly turns her head, eyes shifting from contemplation to slight concern. Her messy bun loosens as she moves, strands gently falling. Subtle changes in the warm, golden-orange light play across her face, emphasizing shifting shadows and expressions. The futuristic city background subtly pulsates with glowing streaks and geometric shapes, reflecting the changing light.
image_prompt: Vertical image, anime/digital art, young woman in futuristic city. Dark blue/teal palette, orange/white accents. High angle, looking down. Messy dark bun, golden-orange lit face, contemplative expression. Loose white tank top, dark shorts. Cyberpunk/glitch art background, blurred vertical lines, geometric shapes, glowing orange/teal streaks. Dramatic lighting and shadow, high-tech, mysterious atmosphere.
refined_video_prompt: Her head slowly turns, eyes shifting from contemplation to slight concern. Her bun loosens, strands gently falling. Warm, golden-orange light subtly changes across her face, emphasizing shifting shadows and expressions. The background subtly pulsates with glowing streaks and geometric shapes, reflecting the changing light.
